column6: Finally, the mystery of what Polaris witnessed in the recesses of space is revealed. The answer is something so twisted, so mind-bending, so outrageous, you'll be beating yourself with a paddle for missing this issue.
column8: | colorist:Liquid Graphics | penciller (cover):Salvador Larroca | inker:Danny K. Miki | writer:Peter Milligan | letterer:Cory Petit
